name: Slurpy Slime
description:
Simple and casual game. Cute and silly.

You are a lowly slime. Larger monsters are trying to squash your disgusting self. Fuse with other slimes and become big enough to take revenge!

Arrow keys or wasd to move. Simply touch the other monsters to grow larger. Super and mega absorbers unlock once the slime becomes large enough so you can absorb skeletons, goblins and golems and take revenge. 

Artwork is not my own. All sprites and images are hosted on opengameart.org

This will be a game that I update whenever I learn something new in coding. 

One issue I know of so far is a low chance of spawning in water. Click the right mouse button to suicide and then restart the level. 

Any bugs or feedback or criticism will be extremely helpful so please leave a comment below if you can think of anything. 

Happy gaming!
